**Features**
-

* cPanel/WHM
* UK Based Servers (Nottingham)
* SSD Drives
* Network Firewall
* Softaculous Script Installer
* LiteSpeed Web Server

<em>&nbsp;<em>

**Location**:  

These offers are based out of the Melbourne facility in Nottingham, UK. SSAE 16, SAS70, ISO 9001, and ISO 27001 accredited.  


**Terms**:  

No CPU intensive tasks (bursting 100% of your core allowed), no SPAM/bulk mail, no warez or pirated content. Nothing illegal in the UK. Please read the full [Terms of Use](https://pageclick.net/legal).  

We accept PayPal, Credit/Debit Card (via Stripe), and Bitcoin.
